import React, {Component, useState } from 'react'; import Tphoto from "./thanos.png"; import TopBar from "./TopBar"; import Bphoto from "./blankProfile.png" import { Container, Row, Col, NavLink, Button, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText} from "reactstrap"; import "./Home.css" export default class EditUser extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { prefModal: false, userModal: false, family: [ {name: "spouse", id: 1}, {name: "child", id:2}], preferences: [{ pref: "Lactose Intolerant" , id: 1}, {pref: "Vegan", id: 2}], }; this.prefToggle = this.prefToggle.bind(this); this.userToggle = this.userToggle.bind(this); } familyCard(fMember){ return( {fMember.name} Edit ); } dietCard(pMember) { return(

{pMember.pref}
